content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Mannheim to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. What would be your initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I appreciate your time and effort in showing me the apartment. Based on my research and considering the current market, I believe a fair price for this apartment would be €800 per month. Is this within your budget range?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Your offer of €800 per month is a good starting point. I'm interested in finding a tenant who will appreciate the value of this apartment. Would you be willing to pay a small deposit to secure the lease?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Certainly, Mr. Heine, a deposit is a standard practice in renting. I would be willing to pay a deposit to secure the lease. Would €500 be acceptable as the deposit amount?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: €500 as a deposit is quite reasonable. It shows your commitment to the lease and helps protect my investment in the property. Now, regarding the rental price, would you be open to discussing a slightly higher amount, say €850 per month? This would reflect the quality of the apartment and its location.
name: Heinrich Heine
